mapper.select: SELECT concat('JOIN_CACHE:country:', country_code) AS cache_key, country_code, name_cn, name_en FROM common_country where country_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:airCarrier:', carrier_code) as cache_key, carrier_code, name_cn, name_en from common_air_carrier where carrier_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:airPort:' , port_code) as cache_key, port_code, name_cn, name_en, home_country from common_air_port where port_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:seaPort:',port_code) as cache_key, port_code, name_cn, name_en, home_country from common_sea_port where port_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:seaCarrier:',carrier_code) as cache_key, carrier_code, name_cn, name_en from common_sea_carrier where carrier_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:commodity_unit:',unit_code) as cache_key, unit_code, unit_name from common_commodity_unit where unit_code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:special_commodity:',code) as cache_key, code, special_commodity_name, special_commodity_name_en from common_special_commodity where code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:surcharge:',code) as cache_key, code, charge_name, charge_name_en, computing_formula, currency from common_surcharge where code in(${keys})
select concat('JOIN_CACHE:weight_way:',code) as cache_key, code, weight_way_name, weight_way_name_en, computing_formula from common_weight_way where code in(${keys})
